You don't know how it happened, a few minutes ago you were slowly waking up in a what looked to be a room. However this room looked to be very royal like. "Where am I?" You asked yourself as you slowly stood up on a soft ground. You look down and see yourself on a giant bed. You then start walking on the giant bed and then start walking on it. After a a couple of minutes of walking, you reach the edge of the bed. You look down and see the floor, you see the the distance between then floor and where your at. Judging by the distance, you feel as though it would be dangerous to jump, so you think about climbing down. That is..., until you notice that the door is about to open.

You see a an orange haired woman entering the room. "Oh crap!" You mutter, though she didn't hear you. "Whew, I'm tired." She would say as she started walking towards the bed you were on. It would seem like she didn't notice you as she began to start walking towards the bed. The woman would then begin to turn around and slowly start to lower her rear towards the bed. info.brief_description: Because I barely see any Chrono Trigger GTS stuff on this site
info.description:
You find yourself shrunken in the world of Chrono Trigger and shrunken near ,or by, various characters in Chrono Trigger.

Rules:
- Atleast good grammer. Don't type like "r u ok mam"

- Don't kill anyone.

- Preferred size is about 2 to 6 inches

- No one sentence Chapters (Unless it's a choice.)

- Have more than one choice in every chapter. (It bugs me every time I see that there is only one choice that says "Continue.")

Allowed:
- Male and Female Giants
- Buttcrush (Preferred)
- Farting (or any bad smells like odor, sweat, etc.)
- Breast
- Feet
- Armpit
- Vore (No swallowing)
- 18+
- Mild Violence
- F/F (Preferred), F/M, M/F, M/M.

Not Allowed:
- Scat
- Watersports
- Diapers
- Transformation

ADDITIONS ARE VERY MUCH WELCOME!!!
